column4: hi, how do I learn how to make a ubuntu package for my program? thanks
can you be a little more specific, what do you mean make your own packages ?
I do not have it installed
hold on I'll have a look
is that a direct link to the video ? it's not loading for me at all
it is a webpage with an embedded video
well , the page title is loaded in the tab but the webpage isn't loading , well not yet anyway I expect it to time out any second
the page just loaded , hold on
it's not playing for me either,  try right clicking , copy url and then paste the url in a desktop session of mplayer
it may be related to the win32 codecs. do you have them installed?
I just installed every gstreamer packages,  I don,t have problems watching most things,  I know bbc is a problem for many ppl
wait I will try to install the win32 codecs from the mplayer webpage...
installing the win32 codecs from mplayer.org helped :)
